name: SenseCAP Wireless Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor
description: SenseCAP Wireless Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor measures soil volumetric water content (VWC) and temperature. It's designed with a 2-in-1 sensor that integrates soil temperature and soil moisture, a custom battery and an IP66 enclosure, optimized for outdoor use cases that need reliable data collection over years.
author: Akenza AG
